speaker: Sigil Door
lines: You find a stone door covered in frost runes.
Your breath fogs the smallest marks.
You trace a counter-mark you were taught long ago.
Frost recedes and clean chisel lines appear.
A blue light runs along the seam of the door.
The stone shifts and opens a narrow way.

give_item.name: Aegis Cloak
give_item.description: A cloak stitched with mountain sigils

choices.text: Slip through the opened seam toward the upper slopes.
